radiographic_examinations.findings: Serum testosterone levels below detection limits; low inhibin B (37 and 199 pg/mL); low to undetectable gonadotropins [LH, undetectable and 0.07 IU/L; FSH, 0.18 IU/L]
Undetectable testosterone levels; low FSH and LH.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Testosterone increased to 3.16 nmol/L after stimulation with human CG.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Undetectable serum testosterone; low FSH (0.18 IU/L), LH (0.07 IU/L), and inhibin B (199 pg/mL).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant effect on genital development with penile and scrotal growth noted after testosterone treatment.
